com.reportmill.graphics

Interface RMPainter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RMShapePainter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMShapePainterJ2D

    public interface RMPainter
extends java.lang.Cloneable
    A base class for painting RMShapes.
